trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around May 14th 2009
divs: sighting detailshelo, i live in port melbourne. on thursday at about 0615 i saw a very strange light rather close to the earth... closer than a star but it looked like a very bright large star, more like a large light. it drew my attention as i sit outside to have my morning coffee & i had nver seen anything in that part of the sky before at that time in the morning.it was more like a light from a helicopter but no sound & not moving (well to the naked eye that is) i decided to try and take a photo of it, using my phone camera ( 5.1 megapixels) when i zoomed in on it was so shocked the object was multicoloured lights, oscillating, & "morphing" it's shape from a circle to sphere to a cylinder changing colour all the time & moving very fast darting in & out of the camera frame. i managed to take a picture and also video it. i was recording it for over 15 minutes and was amazed at the way it was moving & the colours. the sun started to rise & the light\object seemed to move away back into the sky then suddenly disappeard very quickly as the sun was rising. i ran back in to the house to show my son the picture and video, the picture was there but the video would only play for acouple of seconds & then stop i had taken many clips & each clip did the same thing even though i was continuing video for many minutes at a time. now the really freaky part about this is later that evening i found a strange message on my phone when i picked it up saying "remove memory card & press o.k." i don't have a memory card in my phone, i just pressed cancel.i contiued on keeping the kids etertained but noticed that there was a lot of static in the air i kept getting a shock from touching objects and touching the kids. i never thought anything about it at the time until the next morning when i was going to transfer the footage & pics acrosss to the pc & found that all my media photo's, video's & music had been deleted from the phone! i tried using the camera & video player that worked fine, but when i connnected the phoneto my pc i have found that the e drive memory is now existent now! i strongly feel that the sighting is connected to what happened to my phone & without wanting to sound weird it's alsmost like they didn't want me to show any anybody else although my son did see the picture initially & thought it was very "cool". are you able to tell me if there were any sightings at this time reported? also can you recommend someone who may be able to examine my phone. i am also hesitant to say but feel it's worth mentioning that i had a very strange dream a week earler which left me emotionally drained for days, it was very real... i was flying through the air on a triangular shaped "surfboard" object. however i was pulled into the air on it by a very strong force that seemed to draw me up from my abdomen area... i couldn't move or stop it. i'm not saying i was abducted but if was an extremely strange experience one that was so real & is vivid in my mind. i hopte you don't think i am strange for what i have said, but felt i needed to tell someone. thanking you. your's sincerely,
Summary: I saw an unusal light, decided to video it and found when I zoomed in that it was multicoloured, oscillating & changing shape to cylinder, moving erratically & very fast, later the photographic evidence seemed to delete itself later that day.
